title: Required officers
context: D. Officers [ยง414-231] Required officers. (a) A corporation has the officers described in its bylaws or appointed by the board of directors in accordance with the bylaws. (b) A duly appointed officer may appoint one or more officers or assistant officers if authorized by the bylaws or the board of directors. &copy; The bylaws or the board of directors shall delegate to one of the officers responsibility for preparation and custody of minutes of the directors&rsquo; and shareholders&rsquo; meetings and for authenticating records of the corporation. (d) The same individual may simultaneously hold more than one office in a corporation. [L 2000, c 244, pt of ยง1]
